glsa.title: Openfire: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Openfire, the worst of which could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Openfire is a real time collaboration (RTC) server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Openfire. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or bypass security restrictions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Openfire users should upgrade to the latest version:
